title: Accommodation Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at Nacro (Nottingham, England) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions:
I was interviewed for this role at the start of May, told I had the job 5 days later. It is now 14th July, I still have no start date. I have completed the vetting process, handed in all documents, and chased my line manager and each time I've been told they are desperate for me to start but they need to clear things with HR first. This has been the line for the last three weeks.

I have completed vetting before for previous roles so I was aware these things could take up to 6 weeks. But now I am looking for another job because I cannot wait any longer and no one seems to do anything towards getting myself, and the other three new starters on board.

title: Engagement and Culture Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Nacro (London, England) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward and the feedback was spot on .this has helped me with my other interviews and has opened up my thought process.I would have loved working with an organization like nacro but unfortunately couldn’t clear their interview which was ver6 organized and done by extremely professional staff of nacro
Interview Questions: Why Nacro and what is it about Nacro that attracted you
